content: a lacy quick and pretty project from scarf to full size shawl you can make it any size desired with any yarn weight and fiber choose a hook for desired drape written pattern with charts included sample shown made with a cotton/acrylic blend sport weight yarn and a 5 5mm hook usa crochet terms and abbreviations used note please do not translate to other languages without my permission first if you need anything please let me know and i ll help out as best i can thanks nota favor de no traducir a otro idioma sin mi consentimiento si necesitan algo con gusto ayudo en lo que puedo gracias
